posts.post_title: looking to buy SGC Portrait Joss or Lajoie
posts.post_content:
currently trying to add one of cards i've been after

looking for a T206 Portrait of Addie Joss or Nap Lajoie
preferably in an SGC holder (open to PSA) between 1-4


emailing is the easiest way of reaching me
[url]BigDan502@yahoo.com[/url]
Let me know if you're interested in my PSA 3 Joss portrait. Piedmont 150. Thanks, Tim.
